message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm willing to compromise
Your offer was unfair to me. I'm proposing a more balanced split considering the inflation we're facing.
Considering the inflation is affecting you more, my offer is still generous. Take it before the money loses more value
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  Let's be reasonable and split it evenly.  Any further delays only hurt me more than you.
You're right, delays hurt you more. But I'm not going to split it evenly. This is my final offer, take it or leave it
